step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, open your palm and fingers wide, stretching them out.
Great job making a fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale. Remember to visualize the fluid moving.
Perfect! Relax your hand and exhale. You're doing great with this repetition.
You're maintaining good form on this second rep. Keep that arm extended overhead.
Nicely done opening your hand wide. Focus on the stretch in your fingers.
Keep up the good work making a tight fist while inhaling. You're really engaging those muscles.
Fantastic! Relaxing your hand and exhaling completes the second rep. You've got this!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and really focus on opening your hand wide and making a tight fist with each breath. This helps promote lymph flow effectively.
